name: Location: Unknown -- A Lost Prison Stealth Game
name_original: Location: Unknown -- A Lost Prison Stealth Game
description:
(This game was originally created for the Lost Cartridge Jam 3)

You wake up in a mysterious prison, the whereabouts of which you don't know. Can you find your way out and escape?

CONTROLS:

Z = A

X = B

ARROWKEYS = DPAD

ENTER = START

Estimated playtime: 5 - 10 minutes

Disclaimer: If you find any game-breaking bugs, please notify me.

Enjoy!
